subject: Complex test process
msgSnippet: I am setting up a complex test process that takes a WSDL file, generates java files from it, and then compiles the java files.  After that, it will deploy the
messageBody:
I am setting up a complex test process that takes a
WSDL file, generates java files from it, and then
compiles the java files. After that, it will
deploy the generated service, excersize it, and
then undeploy the service.

I either plan on using my Avalon framework test,
or the TestSetup extension to do all the pre
and post work. I will have to force the order
of the deploy/undeploy, but I want them counted
as part of the test.

What do you think is the best way of approaching
that? I know it isn't strictly "unit testing",
in that it has an entire process to go through.
